publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1485 John Scott: Hannah Research Institute-That the Parliament notes with concern the funding cuts imposed on the Hannah Research Institute, Ayr, at a time when other Scottish Agricultural and Biological Research Institutes have had increased funding made available to them.
S1M-1485 Hannah Research Institute (lodged on 19 December 2000) Mr Jamie McGrigor*

S1M-1485 John Scott: Hannah Research Institute—That the Parliament notes with concern the funding cuts imposed on the Hannah Research Institute, Ayr, at a time when other Scottish Agricultural and Biological Research Institutes have had increased funding made available to them. Supported by: Mr Jamie McGrigor
S1M-1485 Hannah Research Institute (lodged on 19 December 2000) Alex Johnstone*, Phil Gallie*, Alex Neil*
S1M-1485 Hannah Research Institute (lodged on 19 December 2000) Michael Russell*, Alex Fergusson*

S1M-1485 John Scott: Hannah Research Institute—That the Parliament notes with concern the funding cuts imposed on the Hannah Research Institute, Ayr, at a time when other Scottish Agricultural and Biological Research Institutes have had increased funding made available to them. Supported by: Mr Jamie McGrigor, Alex Johnstone, Phil Gallie, Alex Neil, Michael Russell, Alex Fergusson
S1M-1485 Hannah Research Institute (lodged on 19 December 2000) Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-1485 Hannah Research Institute (lodged on 19 December 2000) Mr Gil Paterson*
